tags.name: Interfaces
tags.description: API for managing interfaces and their methods

tags.name: Mock Services
tags.description: APIs for capturing and processing SOAP, REST and custom requests.

tags.name: MockData
tags.description: API for handling mock data operations

get.description: Routes the GET request to the appropriate subsystem

put.description: Routes the PUT request to the appropriate subsystem

post.description: Routes the POST request to the appropriate subsystem

delete.description: Routes the DELETE request to the appropriate subsystem

post.description: Saves a record. Normally returns HTTP 200, but may return HTTP 500 in case of errors.
Creates a new record session. Normally returns HTTP 200, but may return HTTP 500.
Save a new or existing record configuration.

get.description: Captures a SOAP WSDL request and returns the response.

post.description: Captures a SOAP request and returns the response.
Processes a custom request and returns the response.
Save the provided global configuration data.
Saves tenant data provided in the request

get.description: Returns a list of all records. Normally returns HTTP 200, but may return HTTP 500 in case of errors.

parameters.name: load_count
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to load

parameters.name: last_loaded_id
parameters.description: ID of the last loaded record

get.description: Returns a single record based on the provided ID. Normally returns HTTP 200, but may return HTTP 500 in case of errors.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the record to load

get.description: Returns a list of record sessions. Normally returns HTTP 200, but may return HTTP 500.
Load a record configuration by its ID.
Fetch mock data using the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the mock data to load

get.description: Fetch all mock profiles with pagination.

parameters.name: last_loaded_id
parameters.description: Last loaded profile ID for pagination

get.summary: Load mock data for mock profile by name or ID
get.description: Fetch mock data using mock profile ID or name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: ID or name of the mock profile

get.description: Fetch mock profile using the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the mock profile to load

get.description: Fetch interface using the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the interface to load

get.description: Fetch records for the specified method of an interface.

get.summary: Load record configs for a method
get.description: Fetch record configurations for the specified method.

get.summary: Load mock data for a method
get.description: Fetch mock data for the specified method.
Retrieves the current state of the system

get.summary: Gets the state of a subsystem
get.description: Retrieves the state of a specified subsystem

delete.description: Deletes a record based on the provided ID. Normally returns HTTP 200, but may return HTTP 500 in case of errors.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the record to delete

delete.description: Deletes all records. Normally returns HTTP 200, but may return HTTP 500 in case of errors.
Deletes a record session by ID. Normally returns HTTP 200, but may return HTTP 500.
Delete a record configuration by its ID.
Delete mock data using the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the mock data to delete

delete.description: Delete mock profile using the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the mock profile to delete

delete.description: Delete interface using the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the interface to delete

delete.description: Deletes the tenant with the specified ID

BaseData.description: Global configuration data to be saved
